name: tutor-manager
description: Tutor.com auto scheduler and facilitator of billing information

scripts.build: cross-env BUILD_ACTION=clean_build node build-helper.js && babel src/ -d build/src/ && cpy src/page/views/ build/ && cpy src/public/ build/ && cpy db/db.sqlite3.sql build/ && cpy node_modules/ build/ && cross-env BUILD_ACTION=package_json node build-helper.js
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run build:exe
